title: Lost Love Found
description: When love is lost, can someone find it again? When love is lost, is it possible to be found? Itâ€™s been a few months since Saige Day has lost her husband. Now she is on a journey to rediscover herself after her loss and after she has spent so much time throwing herself into her work. Cameron Marcus has been given a mission by his deceased wife to find happiness and to see the world for himself. When these two meet anything is possible.
author: A. McCarty
